sentences: A contact group on the AIJ and its pilot phase raised a number of issues, including: whether to continue the review beyond this session; if the pilot phase should continue and, if so, in what form; whether the group should take decisions or make recommendations about the eligibility of AIJ to become CDM or JI; and if the issue of eligibility should be discussed by the contact group on mechanisms.
Some delegates stressed the need to discuss AIJ's prospects, noting the need for incentives to maintain the momentum.
enb_long_title: Fifth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
